alert.note: Alert for Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:09PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marinette County through 700 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wausaukee, or 23 miles northwest of Marinette, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Marinette County, including the following locations... Mcallister. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
